author: H S
Narasimha Kumar
text:
A part-time lecturer at the Karnataka Dr. Gangubai Hangal Music and Performing Arts University here has been asked to go on long leave following complaints of sexual harassment by girls.

As many as 16 students of B.A. and diploma courses have filed complaints with the Vice-Chancellor of the university against Shivakumar, the lecturer. The students alleged that they had registered the complaint nearly 22 days ago. However, action was taken only when they were about to file a police complaint. V-C Sarvamangala Shankar said a sexual harassment committee had been formed.

The lecturer is alleged to have misbehaved with students during a tour to Bengaluru
title: Mysuru lecturer accused of sexual harassment
